body:
Does anyone know a exact date that staff applications open i know its in January, because lately there has only been one or none staff members on-line trying to respond to all reports and us as players get fairly frustrated when reports aren't being responded to because it can also effect the game play , there I was just asking thanks.

You may delete this post after you told me the date to prevent spam!:)

title: Does anyone know...

replies.body: There is no exact date, only a general area where they will open.
replies.body_tagged: There is no exact date, only a general area where they will open.

replies.body: This will be announced. All I can say is that it is January 2015. :)
